}}{{TIDTOC|adapter}} ==Overview== "GIGABYTE" and "GC-AQC107" is silkscreened on the top of the [http://images.anandtech.com/doci/11024/2017-01-04%2009.52.23.jpg board]. :This device has a heatsink affixed to the Ethernet controller.
==Links of Interest== ===Reviews=== *[http://www.anandtech.com/show/11024/gigabyte-exhibits-an-aquantia-aqc107-based-10g-ethernet-pcie-card ''Aquantia AQC107 based 10G Ethernet PCIe Card'' on '''AnandTech'''] *[https://www.anandtech.com/show/12015/gigabytes-gcaqc107-10g-ethernet-pcie-card-launched-and-listed ''Gigabyte GC-AQC107 10G Ethernet PCIe Card'' on '''AnandTech''']
==See also== *[[ASUS ROG Areion 10G]] - 10GbE PCI-Express LAN Card • [https://rog.asus.com/articles/coming-soon/the-poseidon-gtx-1080-ti-and-other-new-rog-products-debut-at-jtr-outshine-the-competition/ PR] *[[ASUS XG-C100C]] - 10G Base-T Adapter (Aquantia AQC107) • [https://www.anandtech.com/show/11598/asus-launches-xgc100c-10-gbe-adapter-aquantia-aqc107-99 PR] *[[ASUS XG-U2008]] - 10G Base-T Network Switch (2x 10G + 8x 1G) • [https://www.anandtech.com/show/10742/asus-xg-u2008-10gbase-t-network-switch-released-249-usd PR] *Gigabyte GC-AQC107 - 1/5/10GbE PCI-Express LAN Card • [http://www.anandtech.com/show/11024/gigabyte-exhibits-an-aquantia-aqc107-based-10g-ethernet-pcie-card PR] *[[Gigabyte GC-AQC108]] - 1/2.5/5GbE PCI-Express LAN Card
